Package ru.nsu.g.solovev5.m.task112.cards

Class Hand

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.g.solovev5.m.task112.cards.Hand
public class Hand extends Object
Represents a hand of participant. Provides functionality for creating a hand, adding, hiding cards and calculating total cost.
